post_title: FT: T206 Stahl/Tolstoi (glove shows) SGC A
post_content:
Up for trading: T206 Jake Stahl (glove shows) with a Tolstoi back, SGC A (evidence of trimming).
I mostly collect vintage Red Sox and will include some of my wants below, but am willing to consider other offers as well (particularly other vintage Red Sox not listed), either raw or graded.
Email/message works best, thanks.
I also have a 1915 Cracker Jack Ray Collins SGC 1.5 for trading and would be happy to combine these two cards in a deal, link here: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2226828#post2226828[/url]

T205 Red Sox
1934 Goudey: 19 Lefty Grove
1939 Play Ball: 7, 14, 16, 20, 27, 62, 103, 107
1940 Play Ball: 29, 32, 33, 34, 36, 38, 133, 196, 197, 198, 226
1941 Play Ball: 13, 15, 30, 63, 64
1948 Leaf: 27, 30, 75, 83, 108, 121, 161
Still looking for trade offers - feel free to offer something not on the short list, I'm open to discovering something I hadn't thought about adding to my collection before.
Closest thing I have to vintage RedSox lol.
T2o6 Fred Beck, Boston Amer. PSA 2 Old Mill
Still looking for a trade, thanks!
